entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 5.
